item.title: OpenPPG X4 Configurator
item.description: Change settings on your OpenPPG device via USB Connect Controller config Orientation Left Hand Right Hand Units Metric Temperature (c) Metric Altitude (m) Baro Pressure Calibration mbar Get baro pressure for your area here Battery Battery Min Voltage (0%) volts for 6S Lipo use 42 and for 7S Lipo use 49 Battery Max Voltage (100%) volts for 6S Lipo use 50 and for 7S Lipo use 58.
